name: Robots, robots everywhere
description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

key_work.title: Set design in Dishonored 2
key_work.brief_description: Dishonored 2 is set 15 years after the Lord Regent has been vanquished and the dreaded Rat Plague has passed into history. An otherworldly usurper has seized the throne from Empress Emily Kaldwin, leaving the fate of the Isles hanging in the balance.

constellations_primary.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_primary.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

end.title: Love, Death & Robots

video_links.name: LOVE DEATH + ROBOTS VOLUME 2 | Official Trailer | Netflix
LOVE DEATH + ROBOTS | Official Trailer [HD] | Netflix

end.brief_description: Terrifying creatures, wicked surprises and dark comedy converge in this NSFW anthology of animated stories presented by Tim Miller and David Fincher.

constellations_other.name: Bear with me...
constellations_other.description: From lovable anthropomorphic bears to hyperreal grizzlies, explore connections between cartoon and CGI bears across screen culture.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

links.description: The Dishonored world incorporates both clockwork and supernatural themes and design elements. The ‚ÄúGood Hunting‚Äù episode of Love, Death & Robots draws on these same themes, with a shapeshifting fox that later morphs into a steampunk assassin.

end.title: Ex Machina
end.creator_credit: Allon Reich, Andrew Macdonald and Andrew MacDonald
end.brief_description: A young coder wins a competition to spend a week at a private mountain retreat belonging to the world‚Äôs largest internet company‚Äôs reclusive CEO. But when he arrives, Caleb has to participate in an experiment involving the world‚Äôs first true AI.

constellations_other.name: Dream A Little Crazy: The next stage of human evolution
constellations_other.description: Collaborators Lucy McRae and Rachel Wingfield created a ‚Äòbiological bakery‚Äô for Architecture In Helsinki‚Äôs "Dream A Little Crazy". Manufacturing a series of mass-produced band members the clip explores speculative science and the future of the human body‚Äôs evolution.

constellations_other.name: Arcades and AI
constellations_other.description: Using the godfather of computing, Alan Turing, as a starting point, this Constellation traces the evolution of AI representation on-screen and the way female androids, robots and holograms have been hyper sexualised.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

constellations_other.name: Femme fatales to fembots
constellations_other.description: When women gain power, men get scared. You can see this in the mysterious, seductive and deadly femme fatale. Using her sexuality and intellect to manipulate, control and co-opt power, the femme fatale reflects prevailing attitudes to women.

links.description: Many Love, Death & Robots episodes deal with the complex issues surrounding artificial intelligence (AI). Similarly, Ex Machina explores the nature of AI and what we perceive to be “human”.

end.title: Ghost in the Shell
end.creator_credit: Ken Iyadomi, Ken Matsumoto, Mitsuhisa Ishikawa, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Manga Entertainment, Shochiku and Takashi Watabe

video_links.name: Ghost in the Shell (1995 Movie) Official IMAX Trailer - Mamoru Oshii, Masamune Shirow

end.brief_description: In the year 2029, the barriers of our world have been broken down by the net and cybernetics, leaving humans opens to brain-hacking. When a hacker known as ‘The Puppet Master’ begins involving meddling in politics, a group of cybernetically enhanced cops are called in.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

constellations_other.name: Correcting history
constellations_other.description: Japanese creatives rewrite the misconceptions of their cultural stories in the works featured in this Constellation.

links.description: Motoko, the cyborg protagonist in Ghost in the Shell, questions the nature of identity in an increasingly digital world, while the main antagonist in the film, The Puppet Master, is a form of sentient AI.

video_links.name: Ghost in the Shell | Trailer #2 | Paramount Pictures International
Ghost in the Shell | Trailer #1 | Paramount Pictures International

end.brief_description: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: a human saved from a terrible crash, then cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world’s most dangerous criminals.

links.description: The 2017 remake of Ghost in the Shell garnered huge criticism and accusations of whitewashing after Scarlett Johansson starred as a character of Asian heritage.

end.title: Mass Effect 3
end.brief_description: In Mass Effect 3, you play as Alliance Marine Commander Shepard and your only hope for saving mankind is to rally the civilisations of the galaxy.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

links.description: The Ghost in the Shell soundtrack was composed by Clint Mansell, who also contributed to the score for Mass Effect 3. AI and tech are vital to the Mass Effect world, with the series antagonists a mixed race of synthetic/organic starships.
